LanguageData.MU_GivesPersonalShield_Desc: This upgrade creates shield bubble around mechanoid.
LanguageData.MU_CommandRange_Desc: Range around mechanoid where other mechs can be controlled.
LanguageData.MU_AllowsRemoteControl_Desc: With this upgrade mechanoid can be controlled outside of command range.
LanguageData.MU_MinBodySize_Desc: This upgrade is only for mechs with body size equal or larger than this value.
LanguageData.MU_MaxBodySize_Desc: This upgrade is only for mechs with body size smaller than this value.
LanguageData.MU_MechanoidsToAdd_Desc: Mechanoids which can be upgraded with this upgrade.
LanguageData.MU_Stat_ReloadCost_Desc: The amount of items required to reload this object once.
LanguageData.MU_QualityOffset_Desc: Quality offset to crafting or construction.
